original_text: Immediately, because Herod did not give praise to God, an angel of the Lord struck him down, and he was eaten by worms and died.
korean_text: 헤롯이 영광을 하나님께로 돌리지 아니하므로 주의 사자가 곧 치니 벌레에게 먹혀 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: Immediately, because Herod did not give praise to God
sentences.korean_translation: 즉시, 헤롯이 하나님께 영광을 돌리지 않았기 때문에

sentences.original_text: an angel of the Lord struck him down
and he was eaten by worms
